chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
d0: dstatelet
ii: InductiveInv

Goal:
is_true (uniq [seq t_rcv i | i <- rtsI (rts ii)])

Premises:
rtsI = [eta map (fun rtt : ReceiveInv => rcv_transI (rt_inv (r:=rtt)))] : seq ReceiveInv -> seq (Transitions.receive_trans CohI) Arguments rtsI _%seq_scope
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
t_rcv : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> nat
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nid = nat : Set
Record InductiveInv : Type := II { sts : seq SendInv; rts : seq ReceiveInv; _ : [seq st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p; _ : [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p } Arguments II [sts rts]%seq_scope
Notation seq := list
rts = fun i : InductiveInv => let (sts, rts, _, _) := i in rts : InductiveInv -> seq ReceiveInv
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
sort_map : forall s : seq ?T', sort ?leT [seq ?f i | i <- s] = [seq ?f i | i <- sort (relpre ?f ?leT) s] where ?T : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- Type] ?T' : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- Type] ?f : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- ?T' -> ?T] ?leT : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- rel ?T]
II : forall (sts : seq SendInv) (rts : seq ReceiveInv), [seq st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p -> [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p -> InductiveInv
us = (fun _evar_0_ : forall (sts0 : seq SendInv) (rts : seq ReceiveInv) (e : [seq st i | i <- sts0] = snd_trans p) (e0 : [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p), (fun i : InductiveInv => is_true (uniq [seq t_snd i | i <- stsI (sts i)])) (II e e0) => match ii as i return ((fun i0 : InductiveInv => is_true (uniq [seq t_snd i | i <- stsI (sts i0)])) i) with | @II x x0 x1 x2 => _evar_0_ x x0 x1 x2 end) (fun (sts0 : seq SendInv) (rts : seq ReceiveInv) (Hs : [seq st i | i <- sts0] = snd_trans p) (Hr : [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p) => (fun _evar_0_ : uniq [seq (t_snd (coh:=C...
seq.map_comp : forall (T1 T2 T3 : Type) (f1 : T2 -> T3) (f2 : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), [seq (f1 \o f2) i | i <- s] = [seq f1 i | i <- [seq f2 i | i <- s]]
mapP : reflect (exists2 x : ?T1, x \in ?s & ?y = ?f x) (?y \in [seq ?f i | i <- ?s]) where ?T1 : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- eqType] ?T2 : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- eqType] ?f : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- ?T1 -> ?T2] ?s : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- seq ?T1] ?y : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- Equality.sort ?T2]
map_uniq : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), uniq [seq f i | i <- s] -> uniq s
map_inj_uniq : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2), injective f -> forall s : seq T1, uniq [seq f i | i <- s] = uniq s
map_inj_in_uniq : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), {in s &, injective f} -> uniq [seq f i | i <- s] = uniq s
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
perm_iota_sort : forall (T : Type) (leT : rel T) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), {i_s : seq nat | perm_eq i_s (iota 0 (size s)) & sort leT s = [seq nth x0 s i | i <- i_s]}
EmptyProt = fun i : Label => Protocol i snd_uniq0 rcv_uniq0 : Label -> protocol
functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- Type] ?B : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv |- Type]
Record receive_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := ReceiveTrans { t_rcv : nat; msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool; receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh; r_step_coh : Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step } Arguments Transitions.receive_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.ReceiveTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_rcv]%nat_scope [msg_wf]%function_scope [receive_step]
ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Transitions.ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
sts = fun i : InductiveInv => let (sts, rts, _, _) := i in sts : InductiveInv -> seq SendInv
R_inv = fun rt : receive_trans coh => forall (d : dstatelet) (from : nat) (this : nid) (i : mid) (C : coh d) (m : TaggedMessage) (pf : this \in nodes p d), I d (nodes p d) -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> this \in dom (dstate d) -> msg_wf rt C this from m -> tag m = t_rcv rt -> (forall z : nat_eqType, (z == this) = false -> getLocal z {| dstate := upd this (receive_step rt from m C pf) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} = getLocal z d) ->...-> Prop
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
rcv_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags ([::] : seq (receive_trans coh))) Arguments rcv_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
snd_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.snd_tags ([::] : seq (send_trans coh))) Arguments snd_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
send_step_t = Transitions.send_step_t : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments send_step_t _%function_scope
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
Coherence.sort : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Coherence.cohpred nodes -> dstatelet -> Prop
send_safeI = fun (st : send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat) => send_safe st this to d m /\ I d (nodes p d) : send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments send_safeI _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
CohPred : forall (T : dstatelet -> pred nid) (m : dstatelet -> Prop), Coherence.mixin_of T m -> Coherence.cohpred T
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
send_trans : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type

```simpl.
rewrite <- map_comp.
rewrite <- sort_map.
apply map_inj_uniq.
apply sort_uniq.
apply map_inj_in_uniq.
intros.
apply send_step_coh_t.
apply IHn.
```

original: simpl. rewrite <- map_comp. rewrite <- sort_map. apply map_inj_uniq. apply sort_uniq. apply map_inj_in_uniq. intros. apply send_step_coh_t. apply IHn.
